biotools.summary: Web-based, platform-independent tool to analyse results of pairwise and multiple sequences comparison software. The implemented tool includes the traditional capabilities of this type of software, incorporating the concept of layers from image editing software to represent different comparisons. An innovative feature is the integration of the Evolutionary Events timeline. To extend the functionality, a set of post-processing services has been included.
